hero.title: About Barber Metropole
hero.subtitle: For over 10 years, we have been perpetuating the art of men's hairdressing in Lausanne, combining traditional know-how with modern techniques for a unique experience.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Barber Metropole was born in 2014 with a simple vision: to create a space where the traditional art of barbering meets modern style and service requirements.
story.content2: Located in the heart of Lausanne, Rue des Terreaux 25, our salon has become a reference for style-conscious men. We have built our reputation on the excellence of our services and the quality of our welcome.
story.content3: Today, our team of experienced barbers continues to innovate while preserving the ancestral techniques that make the richness of our craft.

appointment.question: Do I need to make an appointment?
appointment.answer: We strongly recommend making an appointment to guarantee your time slot. You can call us or use our contact form.

payment.question: Do you accept credit cards?
payment.answer: Yes, we accept all major credit cards, cash payments and Twint.

duration.question: How long does a haircut take?
duration.answer: A simple cut takes about 45 minutes, a complete service about 60-90 minutes depending on your needs.

parking.question: Is there parking nearby?
parking.answer: Several public parking lots are available nearby, including Parking de la Riponne, 2 minutes walk away.
